âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ M4B Audiobook Creation â€¢ Multi-Format Input Support (EPUB, PDF, etc.) â€¢ Multi-Format Output Support (AAC, M4A, MP3, WAV, OPUS, FLAC, PCM, M4B) â€¢ Text Cleaning â€¢ Character Identification (Gender, Age)
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides tools to convert text books into audiobooks. It supports multiple input and output formats, offers single and multi-voice narration options, and uses NLP for character identification and metadata generation. The generated audiobooks are in M4B format, including cover and chapter timestamps.
